channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Netflix’s ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ is probably the biggest movie in theaters
item.description: This is Netflix's first time winning the domestic box office.

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: Waymo’s Big Apple score and Nvidia backs Nuro
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility, your hub for news, analysis, and scoops around the future of transportation.

item.title: 8BitDo 64 Bluetooth Controller Review: For Human Hands
item.description: At last, a Nintendo N64 controller designed for two-handed humans.

item.title: The Best Cheap TVs (2025): TCL, Hisense, and More
item.description: Save cash without sacrificing quality with one of these excellent budget TVs.

item.title: Bluesky blocks service in Mississippi over age assurance law
item.description: In a blog post published on Friday, the company explains that, as a small team, it doesn't have the resources to make the substantial technical change...

item.title: Former Meta exec Nick Clegg offers careful criticism of ‘cloyingly conformist’ Silicon Valley
item.description: Meta’s former policy chief Nick Clegg seems to be walking a tightrope as he promotes his upcoming book, “How to Save the Internet.”

item.title: Pintarnya raises $16.7M to power jobs and financial services in Indonesia
item.description: The Indonesian startup, now backed by $16.7M in Series A funding, helps workers find full-time and side gigs while offering financial solutions

item.title: Best 360 Cameras (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: It’s a small world after all, and these cameras can capture all of it at once, giving you a 360-degree view.

item.title: 15 Best White Noise Machines (2025): Lectrofan, Snooz, Hatch, and More
item.description: Help the whole family catch more z’s with soothing background noise from our favorite sound machines.

item.title: Best Heart Rate Monitors (2025), WIRED Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These chest straps and watches will help you keep your finger on your pulse—and many other heart-related metrics.
